column5: Just booked September 4 through 11 at Kabinakagami Lake in celebration of the border opening! The drought is over!!
Nice! I enjoyed my trips to Kaby. Where are you staying? I've stayed at Pine Portage and Kaby Kabins. If I go again, will probably try Windy Point (just due to lake location).

Adam- Pine Portage. I received a lot of information from you and Chris B two years ago when we last went. The two other camps on the southern part of the lake are equally attractive, but our group likes familiar territory. It's the first time we've gone this late in the season and I've already pulled out your maps to start planning! So looking forward to this trip!
